data.text: Niima nu saʋagɔiti, Elifaze, Ɓilidade ta Sofaal, ti ɓeni Zɔɓe wooɠaaʋote fai ʋa, tɔɔzei naa laani ɓɔɠɔ la ga telebogɛ.
Naa Ɓalakele ná-doun zunui Eliyu yiiɠaawanani gola, Ɓuze mavofodai, Lame ná-pɛlɛyeɠei wu nui. É yiiɠaawanani Zɔɓe ma, tɔɔzei naa ɠɛni ɓɔɠɔ ɠaazu ga telebogɛ é leʋe GALA ba.
É yiiɠaawanani ɓalaa Zɔɓe bɔɔla saʋagɔiti ma, tɔɔzei naati ti la ɠɛni faa nɔpɛ kaani, nii ta gooɠaaʋote da, ti Zɔɓe ʋeelalani wafuun ga naa maaʋele.
Eliyu maaɓɔungi woni, aisa é ʋa ɓɔɛ Zɔɓe ʋɔ, tɔ ɠa é ɠɛni ga doungoi Zɔɓe bɔɔla saʋagɔiti saama.
Kɛlɛ Eliyu kaai ma ga kpɔɛ nɔpɛ ge la mɔ ɠɛni bɔɔla nu saʋagɔiti da, ti ʋa bo, é yiiɠaawanani.
Ɓuze mavofodai Ɓalakele ná-doun zunui Eliyu kpɔɛi zeɠeni, é ɠɛ ma:
Gè ɠɛni ɠɛɛzu:
Gaamai zu, nii é nui ɠɛɛzu ga keleɠele nui,
Ɗa-ɠonagiti mɔin vai laade, a è ɠɛ ga ɠima nui.
Naa ɠa é ba, nà è maanɛɛnɛzu, woilo gòoi ma, nà ɓalaa!
«Zaaɠaza, gè ɠɛa maaɓɔungi wosu,
Gè woilogɛ wo-wooiti ma gola ga pagɔ,
À mina ɠɛ ma: ‹Gi ɠimalai ɠaaʋɛ,
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, Zɔɓe ná-kpɔɛiti ti la sakpani, ti ʋa lo bà.
«Ti ʋɛtɛ, ti ɠoozuʋiliga, ti la mɔ gooɠaaʋote feezu!
Gè maaɓɔungi woga, kɛlɛ ti la mɔ ɓɔɛzu,
Nɔ̀un tetegi, nà pɔ nà ɓalaa gè gooɠaaʋotegi ve,
Mazɔlɔɔ ɠi mɔinmɔin ka bɛ̀,
Toɠa zɔsu kòozu, eɠɛ dɔɔi puai kɔlɔ woole niinɛi zu,
À zɛ̀na gè ɓɔɛ, naa ɠa a kɛ gè yɛnvu ga pagɔ,
Gè la losu nu nɔpɛ polu,
Gè la zooni nu lɛɛzu su,
